title: my computer shuts down
body: then i tried to reconnect.. and serveral time to log in theres no reconnect button

replies.body: There might be a serious hardware issue going on if you're shutting down.  Double check your air vents to make sure there's solid air flow, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you directly to find options best fit for you, we'll see you there!
